name: Mr. Driller - Drill Spirits [NDS]
description:
Travel the world in search of your fellow drillers as you scramble to
reach air capsules, rush to avoid falling blocks and race to unlock
extra characters in a pulse-pounding, puzzle-solving panic.

Features

• Dive in the frantic action in seconds for hours of fun.
• Up
to 5 players can race head-to-head wirelessly!
• Test your skills in
Time Attack, Pressure and Mission Modes.
